document:
Kim Clark, from Kinross, died after being hit the car outside an address in South Street, Milnathort, on Tuesday.
Police said Mrs Clark's family were understandably upset at their loss and that she would be greatly missed.
Officers said inquiries into the circumstances of the incident were ongoing.
claim: an 18-year-old woman who died after being hit by a car in east london has been named.
